sentences.english: In Xikang, for instance, a number of problems have cropped up in this field.
sentences.chinese: 比如西康，這方面也出現了一系列的問題。

sentences.english: Soft rock area distribute extensive at south area of Mountain Qin. Which Xikang railway go through.
sentences.chinese: 西康鐵路沿線軟質巖帶在秦嶺以南分佈較廣。

sentences.english: Anatomy of six coniferous woods of Sikang.
sentences.chinese: 西康產六種球果植物之木材解剖。

sentences.english: The establishment of Xikang province is a big event in the modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 西康建省是中國近現代史上的一個重要事件。

sentences.english: The Xikang railway, which will be completed in 2000 estimated, connect the ship way at Ankang.
sentences.chinese: 預計2000年建成的西康鐵路在安康與漢江連通。

sentences.english: The clastic rocks widespread in the Triassic Xikang Group in western Sichuan consist dominantly of turbiditic flysch formations.
sentences.chinese: 三疊系西康羣碎屑岩主體爲一套濁積岩復理石建造。

sentences.english: Soft rock area distribute extensive at south area of Mountain Qin.
